## Learning objectives {.unnumbered}

After reading this chapter, you should be able to:

- Apply sampling techniques to generate synthetic event sets
- Use importance and stratified sampling to improve efficiency in hazard modeling
- Evaluate how sampling choices affect estimates of extreme risk
- Balance computational cost vs accuracy in climate risk estimation

## Essential sampling concepts

1. Monte Carlo sampling and variance reduction
1. Importance sampling for rare events
1. Stratified sampling strategies
1. Synthetic event generation methods
1. Computational efficiency optimization
